item.title: PostgreSQL Full Text Search
item.description: Let’s say we are building an app for searching movies in our private collection. Our app, for simplicity, can only search movies using movie titles. In the following examples we’ll show a few different approaches how to do a full text search using PostgreSQL. In this tutorial we’re going to use the sample database called “dvdrental” which can be found here. Full Text Search using LIKE and ILIKE operators Let’s say we have a movie called “Darkness War” and we want to search it.
